author: dapplion
content:
If you refer to

> Ethereum (USDC, EUROC, ETH)    12    ~3 minutes

it definitely looks like stale docs. With no missed slots 12 slots = 2.4min, where 12 pre-merge block times are indeed 12min.

In PoW the economic security guarantee of a block increases somewhat linearly with each new block. In Ethereum PoS it's more complicated, with more instances of very non-linear behavior. For example this post explains a patched issue of the fork-choice that allowed 10 slot deep re-orgs at low cost https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/05/03/secured-5-disclosures-update
